name: A70
requirements:
Have ONLY Asashio Kai Ni/Asashio Kai Ni D as flagship, Michishio, Ooshio and Arashio in your fleet.
※ doesn't have to be the main fleet
※ If you put Asashio into your fleet, remodel her and then activate the quest you can't clear it for some reason. Either remove her from the fleet and put her back in, or turn the quest off and on again.

name: A71
requirements: Have Asashio Kai Ni D and Ooshio Kai Ni in your fleet.

name: A72

name: A81

Have Michishio Kai Ni, Asashio Kai Ni/Asashio Kai Ni D, Ooshio Kai Ni and Arashio Kai Ni in the fleet.

name: A82

Have Mogami, Michishio, Shigure, Asagumo and Yamagumo in the third fleet.

Have Naganami Kai Ni as flagship, then put 2 of the following ships into your fleet as escort:
Takanami Kai,

Asashimo Kai

name: A84

Form a Fleet with Murasame Kai Ni as Flagship along with at least 3 of the following ships: Yura Kai Ni, Yuudachi Kai Ni, Harusame Kai, Samidare Kai, Akizuki Kai, and two additional ships of your choice.

※ On completion plays Play

name: B1
requirements: Sortie your main fleet!

requirements: Sortie to World 1-1 and clear the stage

requirements: Sortie a fleet with Nagato Kai Ni as flagship, Mutsu Kai as second ship with up to 4 additional ships to world 4-5, 5-5 and obtain S-rank victories at the boss nodes

name: B100
requirements: Sortie a fleet with 1 Light Cruiser, 2 Destroyers or Coastal Defense Ships, 1 Aviation Cruiser or Light Carrier, up to 2 additional ships to world 2-2, 2-3, 2-4, 2-5 and obtain A rank victories at the boss nodes.

name: B101
requirements: Sortie a fleet with Kumano Kai Ni/Kumano Carrier Kai Ni as flagship, Suzuya Kai Ni/Suzuya Carrier Kai Ni as second ship, Mogami Kai, Mikuma Kai, up to 2 additional ships to world 4-5, 6-2 and obtain S rank victories at the boss nodes.

name: B102
requirements: Sortie Ise and Hyuuga both above level 50 as flagship and 2nd ship with 1 Light Cruiser, 2 Destroyers, 1 additional ship to World 2-5, 3-5 and obtain A-rank or better victories at the boss nodes

name: B103
requirements: Sortie Yura Kai Ni as flagship, along with at least 2 of the following ships: Murasame, Yuudachi, Harusame, Samidare, Akizuki, up to 3 additional ships to World 2-3, 5-1 and obtain S-rank victories at the boss node

name: B104
requirements: Sortie Fumizuki Kai Ni, Satsuki Kai Ni, Minazuki Kai, Nagatsuki Kai, up to 2 additional ships to world 3-2 and obtain an S-rank victory at the boss node.

name: B105
requirements: Sortie Saratoga Mk.II or Saratoga Mk.II Mod.2 as flagship, 1 Light Cruiser, 2 Destroyers with 2 additional ships to world 5-5, 6-2 and obtain S-rank victories at the boss nodes.

name: B106
requirements:
Sortie Saratoga Mk.II as flagship to world 6-5 and obtain S-rank victory at the boss node.
※Saratoga Mk.II Mod.2 cannot complete the quest. Must be Saratoga Mk.II.

name: B107
requirements: Sortie a Light Cruiser as flagship, 2 or more Destroyers/Coastal Defense Ships. You may bring up to 3 additional ships. Sortie to World 1-3, 1-4, 1-5 and obtain at least A-rank victories at the boss node.

name: B108
requirements: Sortie a fleet with Asashio, Ooshio, Arashio, Michishio, up to 2 additional ships to world 1-2, 2-2 and obtain S-rank victories at the boss nodes.

name: B109
requirements:
Sortie a fleet including Michishio Kai Ni, Asashio Kai Ni/Asashio Kai Ni D, Ooshio Kai Ni, Arashio Kai Ni, up to 2 additional ships to world 3-2, 5-4 and obtain S-rank(?) victories at the boss nodes.
※ On completion plays Play

name: B110
requirements: Sortie a fleet with 1 Light Cruiser, 1 Seaplane Tender, 1 Light Aircraft Carrier, 3 additional ships to world 3-5 and obtain 2 S-rank victories at the boss node.

name: B111
requirements: Sortie a Fleet with Tatsuta Kai or Tatsuta Kai Ni as  Flagship, with at least 3 or more DD/DEs to World 1-4, 1-6 and clear the boss node with at least an A(?) rank or reach the goal twice on both maps.

name: B112
requirements:
Sortie a Fleet with Murasame Kai Ni as Flagship along with at least 3 of the following ships: Yura Kai Ni, Yuudachi Kai Ni, Harusame Kai, Samidare Kai, Akizuki Kai, two additional ships of your choice to World 5-1, 5-3, 5-4 and obtain at least A-rank victories at the boss nodes.

※ On completion plays Play

requirements: Defeat 10 enemy fleets.

requirements: Sink 3 enemy Transport Ships

name: Bd8

requirements: Sink 20 Transport Ships

requirements: Defeat the boss in 4-4

name: Bw9
requirements: Sortie to 5-2 and get an S-Rank at the boss node 2 times

name: Bw10
requirements: Sortie to 1-5 and get at least an A-rank at the boss node 3 times

name: Bm1
requirements: Sortie Myoukou, Nachi, Haguro, with 3 additional ships to World 2-5 and obtain an S-Rank victory at the boss node

name: Bm2
requirements: Sortie to World 6-1 and obtain three S-Rank victories at the boss node

name: Bm3
requirements: Sortie a fleet with a Light Cruisers as flagship, up to 2 additional Light Cruisers and 3-5 Destroyers to World 1-4. Obtain an S-Rank victory at the boss node

name: Bm4
requirements: Sortie a Fleet with only 3 ships of the following classes: Yamato Class, Nagato Class, Ise Class, Fusou Class, 1 Light Cruiser, with 2 additional ships to World 5-1 and obtain an S-Rank victory at the boss node

name: Bm5
requirements: Sortie to World 1-5 and obtain 10 A-Rank or better victories at the boss node
note: Requires: B21, Bm1 Unlocks: B57, F25

name: Bm6
requirements: Sortie 2 Aircraft Carriers, 2 Destroyers, and 2 additional ships to World 4-2 and obtain an S-Rank victory at the boss node
note: Requires: B20, Bw4 Unlocks: Bm7, Bq1(?), A56, A59(?), F22

name: Bm7
requirements: Sortie a Destroyer as flagship, 1 Heavy Cruiser (Aviation Cruisers do not count), 1 Light Cruiser, with 3 other Destroyers to World 2-5 and obtain an S-Rank victory at the boss node

name: Bq1
requirements: Sortie a fleet to World 2-4 and obtain two S-Rank victories at the boss node.

name: Bq2
requirements: Sortie to World 2-4, 6-1, 6-3 and obtain A-rank or better victories at the Boss nodes. Sortie to World 6-4 and obtain an S-rank victory at the Boss node

name: Bq3
requirements: Sortie a fleet consisting of 2 Aviation Battleships/ Fleet Oilers + up to 4 additional ships to world 1-6 and reach the goal point twice.

name: Bq4
requirements: Sortie a fleet with 1 Seaplane Tender, 2 Light Cruisers + 3 additional ships to world 6-3 and obtain 2 A-rank or better victories at the boss node

name: Bq5
requirements: Sortie a fleet with 1 Light Cruiser, up to 5 additional ships to world 3-1, 3-2, 3-3 and obtain A-rank or better (?) victories at the boss nodes.

name: Bq6
requirements: Sortie a Fleet with Naganami Kai Ni as Flagship, with at least one of either Takanami Kai, Okinami Kai or Asashimo Kai to World 5-4 and obtain 2 S-rank victories at the boss node

name: Bs15
requirements: Sortie exactly 4 Destroyers to world World 1-1 and World 1-2 and obtain S rank victories at the boss nodes.

name: Bs16
requirements: Sortie 1 AV as flagship and 3 DD, with 2 additional ships to world World 1-3, World 1-4 and obtain S-rank victories at the boss nodes.

name: Bs17
requirements: Sortie 1 CL as flagship and at least 2 or more DD. S-Rank the bosses at World 1-2, World 1-3, and World 1-4.※No wildcards are allowed.

name: Bs18
requirements: Sortie a fleet which includes a Seaplane Tender (AV), Destroyer (DD), OR Submarine Tender (AS) as flagship, with 5 ships of your choice. S-Rank the boss at World 2-3 Three Times.

name: Bs19
requirements: Sortie a fleet which includes 2 BBV, 2 CAV and 2 ships of your choice. BBV must be Flagship. S-Rank the Boss at World 4-2 Three Times.

name: Bs20
requirements: Sortie a fleet which includes 1 CV(B) as flagship with 2 DD and 3 ships of your choice. S-Rank the Boss at World 3-5 Three Times.

name: Bs26
requirements: Sortie a fleet that consists of 1 CL as flagship and up to 5DD to world 1-2 and 1-4. Clear the boss node with at least an A-rank twice on both maps.

name: Bs27
requirements: Sortie a fleet with an AV or a cruiser as flagship with up to 5 additional ships to world 2-2 and 2-3. Clear the boss node with at least an A-rank twice on both maps.

name: Bs28
requirements: Sortie a fleet that consists of only DD/DE and up to 1 CVL to world 1-5 and 1-6. Clear the boss node with at least an A-rank or reach the goal thrice on both maps.

name: Bs29
requirements: Sortie a fleet that consists of 2 DD, a CV(B) as flagship and up to 3 additional ships to world 5-5. Clear the boss node with at least an A-rank four times.

name: G5
requirements:
Prepare 5500 steel & 2500 bauxite, then perform 2 successful modernizations on a CV(B) each with 5 carriers as material.
※Modernisation target must be a CV(B). CVL and AV do not count.
※Modernisation materials can be CV or CVL. AV does not count.
※You don't have to modernise the same carrier twice.
※You must use 5 CV(L) at once for each modernisation attempt.
※The specified resources will be consumed upon clearing the quest.
